movies.title: Mariées mais pas trop
movies.plot: Renée is Laurence's grandmother and she intends to show her how to make rich men fall in love with her, in order to get their life insurance's money. Both women will meet several men in the course of the movie. Even the cynical Renée will fall deeply in love again. But even after getting married, Laurence and Renée don't seem to be able to love their husband for a long time. Will they manage to get rid of their rich, loving but irritating husbands? Will their husbands survive the experience? Or will true love triumph at the end?
movies.simplePlot: Renée is Laurence's grandmother and she intends to show her how to make rich men fall in love with her, in order to get their life insurance's money. Both women will meet several men in the...

biography.bio: Jane Birkin was born on December 14, 1946 in London, England as Jane Mallory Birkin. She is an actress, known for Death on the Nile (1978), Blow-Up (1966) and La belle noiseuse (1991). She was previously married to John Barry.
biography.name: Jane Birkin

biography.bio: Émilie Dequenne was born on August 29, 1981 in Beloeil, Wallonia, Belgium. She is an actress, known for Brotherhood of the Wolf (2001), Rosetta (1999) and À perdre la raison (2012). She has been married to Michel Ferracci since October 11, 2014.
biography.name: Émilie Dequenne

biography.bio: Certainly one of France's supreme farceurs in the classic tradition, comedian Pierre Richard was born to an uppercrust family with an embarrassing riches of middle names as he was christened Pierre Richard Maurice Charles Leopold Defays. Working and building up his trade at the Paris Music Hall in the early years, he appeared in small movie roles thoughout most of the 60s. In the 70s, however, he aimed his genius directly towards film and succeeded beyond the wildest expectations. Directing and co-writing many of his slapstick vehicles, his characters often have taken on an hilariously guileless persona and, coupled with his innate gift for klutzy physical comedy, have become an audience favorite for nearly four decades. His superior work in The Daydreamer (1970) and The Troubles of Alfred (1972) was immediately recognized and this led to the international crossover hit The Tall Blond Man with One Black Shoe (1973) in which Richard played a naive, innocent concert musician plucked by chance to become a superspy on a top secret mission. A potent association in the 1960s and 1970s with actor/producer/director Yves Robert and the 1980s with writer/director Francis Veber and actor Gerard Depardieu produced several comedy classics: Alexander (1967), The Return of the Tall Blond Man with One Black Shoe (1974), The Goat (1981), Les Comperes (1983) and The Fugitives (1986). Many of Richard's classic comedies, including The Toy (1976), have spawned Hollywood remakes and imitations, though most pale compared to the originals.
biography.name: Pierre Richard

biography.bio: Clovis Cornillac was born on August 16, 1967 in Lyon, Rhône, France. He is an actor and director, known for A Very Long Engagement (2004), Astérix aux jeux olympiques (2008) and Eden Log (2007). He has been married to Lilou Fogli since August 30, 2013. They have one child. He was previously married to Caroline Proust.
biography.name: Clovis Cornillac

biography.bio: Jérémie Elkaïm is an actor and writer, known for La guerre est déclarée (2011), Come Undone (2000) and Polisse (2011).
biography.name: Jérémie Elkaïm

biography.bio: Laurent Grévill was born on June 18, 1961 in Saint-Mandé, Val-de-Marne, France. He is an actor, known for Il y a longtemps que je t'aime (2008), Camille Claudel (1988) and Look at Me (2004).
biography.name: Laurent Grévill

biography.bio: Amira Casar was born on May 1, 1971 in London, England. She is an actress, known for Sylvia (2003), L'accordeur de tremblements de terre (2005) and Anatomy of Hell (2004).
biography.name: Amira Casar

biography.bio: Pierre Laroche was born on August 2, 1931 in Etterbeek, Brussels, Belgium. He was an actor and director, known for Bon voyage (2003), Night and Day (1991) and The School of Flesh (1998). He died on March 3, 2014.
biography.name: Pierre Laroche

biography.bio: Henri Cluzel is an actor, known for Mariées mais pas trop (2003), Didine (2008) and L'escalier de fer (2013).
biography.name: Henri Cluzel

biography.bio: Pierre Fox is an actor, known for Service compris (1988), Mariées mais pas trop (2003) and Un crime très populaire (2008).
biography.name: Pierre Fox

biography.bio: Jean-Luc Gaget is a writer and actor, known for L'effet aquatique (2016), Lulu femme nue (2013) and Je te mangerais (2009).
biography.name: Jean-Luc Gaget

biography.bio: Charles Vanbrugghe is an actor, known for Mariées mais pas trop (2003) and L'instit (1993).
biography.name: Charles Vanbrugghe

biography.bio: Joan Pauliac is an actress, known for Mariées mais pas trop (2003).
biography.name: Joan Pauliac

biography.bio: Alberlico Soopaya is an actor, known for Mariées mais pas trop (2003).
biography.name: Alberlico Soopaya

biography.bio: Max Rensonnet is an actor, known for Welcome (2009), Story of the Dead (2006) and Sister Smile (2009).
biography.name: Max Rensonnet
